"""
@file config.py
@brief Centralized configuration manager for the teleoperation system
@details Provides type-safe access to robot configurations with validation
         and centralized management of all robot parameters.
"""



[docs]
class Configuration:
    """
    @brief Configuration manager for robotic arm teleoperation system
    @details Provides centralized access to robot configurations with
             validation and default value handling for all teleoperation modules.
    """

    # Robot configurations
    ROBOT_CONFIGS = {
        'panda': {
            'name': 'Franka Emika Panda',
            'xml_path': 'franka_emika_panda/panda.xml',
            'end_effector_body': 'hand',
            'arm_joint_count': 7,
            'axis_remap': {
                'vx': 'vx', 'vy': 'vy', 'vz': 'vz',
                'roll': 'roll', 'pitch': 'pitch', 'yaw': 'yaw'
            },
            'movement_scales': {
                'translation': 0.3, 'rotation': 0.5, 'tilt': 0.5,
                'gripper_open_pos': 1.0, 'gripper_close_pos': 0.0,
                'gripper_speed': 1, 'deadzone_threshold': 0.1
            }
        },
        'ur5': {
            'name': 'UR5e with 2F-85 Gripper',
            'xml_path': 'universal_robots_ur5e/ur5e_with_gripper.xml',
            'end_effector_body': 'robotiq_base',
            'arm_joint_count': 6,
            'axis_remap': {
                'vx': 'vx', 'vy': 'vy', 'vz': 'vz',
                'roll': 'roll', 'pitch': 'pitch', 'yaw': 'yaw'
            },
            'movement_scales': {
                'translation': 0.2, 'rotation': 0.3, 'tilt': 0.3,
                'gripper_open_pos': 1.0, 'gripper_close_pos': 0.0,
                'gripper_speed': 1, 'deadzone_threshold': 0.1
            }
        },
        'so100': {
            'name': 'SO100 Robotic Arm',
            'xml_path': 'trs_so_arm100/so_arm100.xml',
            'end_effector_body': 'Fixed_Jaw',
            'arm_joint_count': 5,
            'axis_remap': {
                'vx': 'vy', 'vy': 'vz', 'vz': 'vx',
                'roll': 'pitch', 'pitch': 'yaw', 'yaw': 'roll'
            },
            'movement_scales': {
                'translation': 0.15, 'rotation': 0.4, 'tilt': 0.4,
                'gripper_open_pos': 0.0123, 'gripper_close_pos': 0.0,
                'gripper_speed': 1, 'deadzone_threshold': 0.1
            },
            'joint_multipliers': {
                'rotation': 0.005, 'wrist_roll': 0.01, 'wrist_pitch': 0.02,
                'pitch': 1.0, 'elbow': 1.0
            }
        }
    }



[docs]
    def get_robot_config(robot_name):
        """
        @brief Retrieve configuration dictionary for specified robot

        @param robot_name: Name of the robot configuration to retrieve
        @return: Copy of the robot configuration dictionary

        @throws ValueError: If robot_name is not found in ROBOT_CONFIGS

        @note Returns a copy to prevent modification of original configuration
        """
        if robot_name not in Configuration.ROBOT_CONFIGS:
            available = list(Configuration.ROBOT_CONFIGS.keys())
            raise ValueError(f"Robot '{robot_name}' not found. Available: {available}")
        return Configuration.ROBOT_CONFIGS[robot_name].copy()





[docs]
    def get_movement_scales(robot_name):
        """
        @brief Retrieve movement scaling parameters for specified robot

        @param robot_name: Name of the robot
        @return: Dictionary of movement scale parameters

        @note Returns default values if movement_scales not defined for robot
        """
        config = Configuration.get_robot_config(robot_name)
        return config.get('movement_scales', {
            'translation': 0.2, 'rotation': 0.3, 'tilt': 0.3,
            'gripper_open_pos': 1.0, 'gripper_close_pos': 0.0,
            'gripper_speed': 1, 'deadzone_threshold': 0.1
        })





[docs]
    def get_joint_multipliers(robot_name):
        """
        @brief Retrieve joint control multipliers for specified robot

        @param robot_name: Name of the robot
        @return: Dictionary of joint multiplier parameters

        @note Returns default values (1.0) if joint_multipliers not defined
        """
        config = Configuration.get_robot_config(robot_name)
        return config.get('joint_multipliers', {
            'rotation': 1.0, 'wrist_roll': 1.0, 'wrist_pitch': 1.0,
            'pitch': 1.0, 'elbow': 1.0
        })
